TopicTitle: Full IVA Landing - Minmus Science Lander - Kalko Space Exploration

Articles.Content:
Welcome to Kalko Space Exploration center (KSE). As adviced by good people in my welcome thread, I decided to share my project in here.

Scientists on Kerbin decided they (were totally bored) needed more science from Minmus.

I had to construct a high-tech (or not) science Lander aimed at Minmus Highlands to gather Goo Data, Science Bay data and Surface gravity data.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

The link for other missions is in signature.
where did you get that mission control room?
